verses.verse: And <WG1161> he said <WG3004> also <WG2532> unto <WG4314> the <WG846> disciples <WG3101>, There was <WG2258> a certain <WG5100> rich <WG4145> man <WG444>, who <WG3739> had <WG2192> a steward <WG3623>; and <WG2532> the same <WG3778> was accused <WG1225> unto him <WG846> that <WG5613> he was wasting <WG1287> his <WG846> goods <WG5224>.

And <WG2532> he called <WG5455> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, What is this <WG5124> that I hear <WG191> of <WG4012> thee <WG4675>? render <WG591> the account <WG3056> of thy <WG4675> stewardship <WG3622>; for <WG1063> thou canst be <WG1410> no <WG3756> longer <WG2089> steward <WG3621>.

And <WG1161> the steward <WG3623> said <WG2036> within <WG1722> himself <WG1438>, What <WG5101> shall I do <WG4160>, seeing <WG3754> that my <WG3450> lord <WG2962> taketh away <WG851> the stewardship <WG3622> from <WG575> me <WG1700>? I have <WG2480> not <WG2480> strength to dig <WG4626>; to beg <WG1871> I am ashamed <WG153>.

I am resolved <WG1097> what <WG5101> to do <WG4160>, that <WG2443>, when <WG3752> I am put out <WG3179> of the stewardship <WG3622>, they may receive <WG1209> me <WG3165> into <WG1519> their <WG846> houses <WG3624>.

And <WG2532> calling <WG4341> to him each <WG1538> one <WG1520> of his <WG1438> lord <WG2962>'s debtors <WG5533>, he said <WG3004> to the first <WG4413>, How much <WG4214> owest thou <WG3784> unto my <WG3450> lord <WG2962>?

And <WG1161> he said <WG2036>, A hundred <WG1540> measures <WG943> of oil <WG1637>. And <WG2532> he said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Take <WG1209> thy <WG4675> bond <WG1121>, and <WG2532> sit down <WG2523> quickly <WG5030> and write <WG1125> fifty <WG4004>.

Then <WG1899> said he <WG2036> to another <WG2087>, And <WG1161> how much <WG4214> owest <WG3784> thou <WG4771>? And <WG1161> he said <WG2036>, A hundred <WG1540> measures <WG2884> of wheat <WG4621>. He <WG2532> saith <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, Take <WG1209> thy <WG4675> bond <WG1121>, and <WG2532> write <WG1125> fourscore <WG3589>.

And <WG2532> his lord <WG2962> commended <WG1867> the unrighteous <WG93> steward <WG3623> because <WG3754> he had done <WG4160> wisely <WG5430>: for <WG3754> the sons <WG5207> of this <WG5127> world <WG165> are <WG1526> for <WG3754> their <WG1438> own generation <WG1074> wiser <WG5429> than <WG5228> the sons <WG5207> of the light <WG5457>.

And I <WG2504> say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213>, Make <WG4160> to yourselves <WG1438> friends <WG5384> by <WG1537> means of the mammon <WG3126> of unrighteousness <WG93>; that <WG2443>, when <WG3752> it shall fail <WG1587>, they may receive <WG1209> you <WG5209> into <WG1519> the eternal <WG166> tabernacles <WG3126>.

He that <WG3588> is faithful <WG4103> in <WG1722> a very little <WG1646> is faithful <WG4103> also <WG2532> in <WG1722> much <WG4183>: and <WG2532> he that <WG3588> is <WG2076> unrighteous <WG94> in <WG1722> a very little <WG1646> is <WG2076> unrighteous <WG94> also <WG2532> in <WG1722> much <WG4183>.

If <WG1487> therefore <WG3767> ye have <WG1096> not <WG3756> been <WG1096> faithful <WG4103> in <WG1722> the unrighteous <WG94> mammon <WG3126>, who <WG5101> will commit <WG4100> to your <WG5213> trust <WG4100> the true riches <WG228>?

And <WG2532> if <WG1487> ye have <WG1096> not <WG3756> been <WG1096> faithful <WG4103> in <WG1722> that which <WG3588> is another <WG245>'s, who <WG5101> will give <WG1325> you <WG5213> that which <WG3588> is your own <WG5212>?

No <WG3762> servant <WG3610> can <WG1410> serve <WG1398> two <WG1417> masters <WG2962>: for <WG1063> either <WG2228> he will hate <WG3404> the one <WG1520>, and <WG2532> love <WG25> the other <WG2087>; or else <WG2228> he will hold to <WG472> one <WG1520>, and <WG2532> despise <WG2706> the other <WG2087>. Ye cannot1410, 3756 serve <WG1398> God <WG2316> and <WG2532> mammon <WG3126>.
And <WG1161> the Pharisees <WG5330>, who <WG2532> were <WG5225> lovers of money <WG5366>, heard <WG191> all <WG3956> these things <WG5023>; and <WG2532> they scoffed <WG1592> at him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> he said <WG2036> unto them <WG846>, Ye <WG5210> are <WG2075> they that <WG3588> justify <WG1344> yourselves <WG1438> in the sight <WG1799> of men <WG444>; but <WG1161> God <WG2316> knoweth <WG1097> your <WG5216> hearts <WG2588>: for <WG3754> that which <WG3588> is exalted <WG5308> among <WG1722> men <WG444> is <WG2076> an abomination <WG946> in the sight <WG1799> of God <WG2316>.

The law <WG3551> and <WG2532> the prophets <WG4396> were until <WG2193> John <WG2491>: from <WG575> that time <WG5119> the gospel of the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> is preached <WG2097>, and <WG2532> every man <WG3956> entereth violently <WG971> into <WG1519> it <WG846>.
But <WG1161> it is <WG2076> easier <WG2123> for heaven <WG3772> and <WG2532> earth <WG1093> to pass <WG3928> away <WG2228>, than for one <WG1520> tittle <WG2762> of the law <WG3551> to fall <WG4098>.

Every one <WG3956> that putteth away <WG630> his <WG846> wife <WG1135>, and <WG2532> marrieth <WG1060> another <WG2087>, committeth adultery <WG3431>: and <WG2532> he that <WG3956> marrieth one <WG1060> that <WG3588> is put away <WG630> from <WG575> a husband <WG435> committeth adultery <WG3431>.

Now there was <WG2258> a certain <WG5100> rich <WG4145> man <WG444>, and <WG2532> he was clothed <WG1737> in purple <WG4209> and <WG2532> fine linen <WG1040>, faring <WG2165> sumptuously <WG2988> every <WG2596> day <WG2250>:
and1161, 2258 a certain <WG5100> beggar <WG4434> named <WG3686> Lazarus <WG2976> was <WG3739> laid <WG906> at <WG4314> his <WG846> gate <WG4440>, full of sores <WG1669>,

and <WG2532> desiring <WG1937> to be fed <WG5526> with <WG575> the crumbs <WG5589> that <WG3588> fell <WG4098> from <WG575> the rich man <WG4145>'s table <WG5132>; yea <WG235>, even <WG2532> the dogs <WG2965> came <WG2064> and licked <WG621> his <WG846> sores <WG1668>.

And <WG1161> it came to pass <WG1096>, that the beggar <WG4434> died <WG599>, and <WG2532> that he <WG846> was carried <WG667> away by <WG5259> the angels <WG32> into <WG1519> Abraham <WG11>'s bosom <WG1161>: and the rich man <WG4145> also <WG2532> died <WG599>, and <WG2532> was buried <WG2290>.

And <WG2532> in <WG1722> Hades <WG86> he lifted up <WG1869> his <WG846> eyes <WG3788>, being <WG5225> in <WG1722> torments <WG931>, and seeth <WG3708> Abraham <WG11> afar <WG3113> off <WG575>, and <WG2532> Lazarus <WG2976> in <WG1722> his <WG846> bosom <WG2859>.

And <WG2532> he <WG846> cried <WG5455> and said <WG2036>, Father <WG3962> Abraham <WG11>, have mercy <WG1653> on me <WG3165>, and <WG2532> send <WG3992> Lazarus <WG2976>, that <WG2443> he may dip <WG911> the tip <WG206> of his <WG846> finger <WG1147> in water <WG5204>, and <WG2532> cool <WG2711> my <WG3450> tongue <WG1100>; for <WG3754> I am in anguish <WG3600> in <WG1722> this <WG3778> flame <WG5395>.

But <WG1161> Abraham <WG11> said <WG2036>, Son <WG5043>, remember <WG3415> that <WG3754> thou <WG4771> in <WG1722> thy <WG4675> lifetime <WG2222> receivedst <WG618> thy <WG4675> good things <WG18>, and <WG2532> Lazarus <WG2976> in like <WG3668> manner evil things <WG2556>: but <WG1161> now <WG3568> here he <WG3592> is comforted <WG3870>, and <WG1161> thou <WG4771> art in anguish <WG3600>.

And <WG2532> besides <WG1909> all <WG3956> this <WG5125>, between <WG3342> us <WG2257> and <WG2532> you <WG5216> there is a great <WG3173> gulf <WG5490> fixed <WG4741>, that <WG3704> they that <WG3704> would <WG2309> pass <WG1224> from hence <WG1782> to <WG4314> you <WG5209> may not <WG3361> be able <WG3366>, and that <WG3588> none may cross over <WG1276> from thence <WG1564> to <WG4314> us <WG2248>.

And <WG1161> he said <WG2036>, I pray <WG2065> thee <WG4571> therefore <WG3767>, father <WG3962>, that <WG2443> thou wouldest send <WG3992> him <WG846> to <WG1519> my <WG3450> father <WG3962>'s house <WG3624>;

for <WG1063> I have <WG2192> five <WG4002> brethren <WG80>; that <WG3704> he may testify <WG1263> unto them <WG846>, lest2443, 3361 they <WG846> also <WG2532> come <WG2064> into <WG1519> this <WG5126> place <WG5117> of torment <WG931>.
But Abraham <WG11> saith <WG3004>, <WG846> They have <WG2192> Moses <WG3475> and <WG2532> the prophets <WG4396>; let them hear <WG191> them <WG846>.

And <WG1161> he said <WG2036>, Nay <WG3780>, father <WG3962> Abraham <WG11>: but <WG235> if <WG1437> one <WG5100> go <WG4198> to <WG4314> them <WG846> from <WG575> the dead <WG3498>, they will repent <WG3340>.

And <WG1161> he said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, If <WG1487> they hear <WG191> not <WG3756> Moses <WG3475> and <WG2532> the prophets <WG4396>, neither <WG3761> will they be persuaded <WG3982>, if <WG1437> one <WG5100> rise <WG450> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498>.
